sql-script.name: case
sql-script.tran-sql:
simpleos_links
CREATE TABLE `simpleos_links` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `userId` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `title` varchar(128) NOT NULL, `color` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `url` varchar(128) , `oorder` bigint(10) , `description` text , `createdDate` datetime, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) )
